description:
After snapshot operation, the snapshot images/disks size are shown as zero even their file size in swift is not zero.

ID Name Disk Format Container Format Size
---------------- ------------------------------ -------------------- -------------------- --------------
16 backup_vm_7 vhd ovf 0
15 image_from_7 vhd ovf 0
14 new_image_9 vhd ovf 0

After the snapshot operation, glance plugin in xenserver uploads the snapshot disk to the glance server. 

Once the upload operation is over, the image size is shown as ZERO and image_status property is 'creating'. 

but actual size of the file in the Swift is not Zero.
title: After snapshot operation, upload snapshot disk size is showing as ZERO in glance
